mapper.insert: insert into biztyreinstock (tyrebrand, tyretype, barcode, createtime, OPERATORID,used, enable,supersingle,figure) values (#{en.tyreBrand}, #{en.tyreType}, #{en.barCode}, #{currentTime}, #{operatorId},#{en.used},#{en.enable},#{en.supersingle},#{en.figure})
mapper.update: update biztyreinstock set PLATE= #{en.plate}, CUSTOMERNAME= #{en.customerName}, VEHICLETYPE= #{en.vehicleType}, UPDATETIME= #{currentTime}, OPERATORID= #{operatorId} where id= #{en.id}
update biztyreinstock set used=1, operatorid=#{operatorId} where barCode= #{en.barCode} and tyrebrand=#{en.tyreBrand} and tyretype=#{en.tyreType}
mapper.select: select * from biztyreinstock where PLATE like CONCAT('%', #{search},'%') or CUSTOMERNAME like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') order by id LIMIT #{skip}, #{pageSize}
